Class DatabaseConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • DatabaseConnection

  • public class DatabaseConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all transactions to and from the MySQL database

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.sql.Connection connection
      JDBC connection to database
      private java.lang.String dbUrl
      URL of the database
      private java.lang.String password
      Password for database
      private java.lang.String user
      Username for database
      private boolean userInfoChecked
      Boolean state to manage if userInfo is checked

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseConnection()
      Automatically connects to the database Call close() to close connection before program terminates

        Returns:

      • checkUsername

        public boolean checkUsername(java.lang.String username)
        This method checks for the validity of the new user's username Returns false if username are already registered Returns true in all other cases
        Parameters:
        username - Username to be checked
        Returns:
        False if username exists in database

      • addNewUser

        public void addNewUser(java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String email,
                       java.lang.String password)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is to be called only after chackNewUserInfo is called and returns a positive result. This method adds a new tuple to the User table
        Parameters:
        username - Username to be added
        email - Email to be added
        password - Password to be added
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • checkPassword

        public java.lang.String checkPassword(java.lang.String username)
        Returns passwordHash corresponding to the given username
        Parameters:
        username - Username to use to get password hash
        Returns:
        Password hash of sent username
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Returns UserID corresponding to the given username
        Parameters:
        username - The username to find the userID of
        Returns:
        The userID of the sent username
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Returns:

        ActivityName - activity name to add
        ExpressionName - expression name to add

      • getCalculateData

                                         java.lang.String activityName)

        ActivityName - Activity name to get calculated data from

      • updateCalculateData

        public boolean updateCalculateData(java.lang.String userID,
                                   java.lang.String activityName,
                                   java.lang.String expressionName,
                                   java.lang.String newExpression)
        Updates a tuple of a given expression from the Calculated Data module when it is edited
        Parameters:
        userID - UserID of calculated data point editor
        activityName - Activity name of data point
        expressionName - Expression name of data point
        newExpression - New expression to update
        Returns:
        True if successful

                                          java.lang.String layoutName)

        Parameters:
        numDownloads - New number of downloads to add
        userId - UserID of the uploader
        layoutName - Layout name of the downloaded layout
